column5: My wife has to go into work tomorrow dressed like this ,  minutes ago she came out of the bathroom trying to sneak up on me ............
You married to my ex`s sister???? NO WAY !!!!!
What's the problem? She seems to be quite a handsome woman.
Did she teach english in Mississauga in 1978?
If she worked at a funeral home, that would very tasteless.
i see you married up and she married down and your furnace is working good
You've must of heard about her .... lol
Straight line is???  Honey, your mother is here.
her face looks to me melting...tsk tsk tsk

My entent with this post is to find out for all of us how many other people here who will be doing the same thing in their work place to day , personaly i would never be able to but i do admire tho's who can and enjoy doing it .
My wife dresses up every year for work, this year she's a clown. She makes the outfits herself.  Best part is she always brings home a bag of goodies.
It was tough to leave for work this morning with her dressed like cleopatra and heading in the opposite direction! LOL
based on your thread title, I thought this was going to be about Honey Boo Boo..
Thank goodness it's not, that's scarier his wifes costume.
